plot: A new mother embarks upon a journey to meet moms from different cultures and life experiences to seek advice on how to raise a good kid.
plot_en: A new mother embarks upon a journey to meet moms from different cultures and life experiences to seek advice on how to raise a good kid.
plot_es: A new mother embarks upon a journey to meet moms from different cultures and life experiences to seek advice on how to raise a good kid.
title: Take Me to Your Mother
